member.summary: Specifies that the asset is in initialized state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.AssetState.Published
member.summary: Specifies that the asset is published.
member.remarks: Published Assets can be used in Job and Tasks, but are immutable. Assets are only allowed to have read and list locators in this state.

member.name: F:Microsoft.WindowsAzure.MediaServices.Client.AssetState.Deleted
member.summary: Specifies that the asset has been deleted.
member.remarks: Deleted Assets cannot be used in Job or Tasks, and do not actually exist and are only exposed for tracking purposes.
